GK19bahcar1u:449: sphuṭitātimuktakakusumastabakasamatviṣi saṭāle mahati mṛgapatāviva gaurī turaṅgame sthita,
GK19bahcar1u:457: kucapūrṇakalaśayorupari ratnaprālambamālikāmaruṇaharitakiraṇakisalayinīṃ kasyāpi puṇyavato hṛdayapraveśavanamālikāmiva baddhāṃ dhārayantī,
GK19bahcar1u:458: prakoṣṭhaniviṣṭasyaikasya hāṭakakaṭakasya marakatamakaravedikāsanāthasya haritīkṛtadigantābhirmaṃyūkhasaṃtatibhiḥ sthalakamalinībiriva lakṣmīśaṅkhayānugamyamānā,
GK19bahcar1u:464: tamālaśyāmalena mṛgamadāmodaniṣyadinā tilakabindunā mudritamiva manobhavasarvasvaṃ vadanamudvahantī,
GK19bahcar1u:481: dūrādeva ca dadhīcapremṇā sarasvatyā luṇṭhiteva manorathaiḥ,
GK19bahcar1u:497: krameṇa cātīte madhyandinasamaye śoṇamavatīrṇāyāṃ sāvitryāṃ snātumutsāritaparijanā sākūteva mālatī kusumasrastaśāyinīṃ samupasṛtya sarasvatīmābabhāṣe--devi,
GK19bahcar1u:500: sarasvatī tu dadhīcasadeśāśaṅkinī kiṃ vakṣyatīti stananihitavāmakaranakharakiraṇadanturitamudbhidyamānakutūhalāṅkuranikaramiva hṛdayamuttarīyakūlavalkalaikadeśena saṃchādayantī,
GK19bahcar1u:502: samutphullasya mukhaśaśino lāvaṇyapravāheṇa śṛṅgārarasenevāplāvayantī sakalaṃ jīvalokam,
GK19bahcar1u:506: “upāṃśu kathaya' iti kapolatalanatibimbitāṃ lajjayā karṇamūlamiva mālatīṃ praveśayantī madhurayā girā sudhīramuvāca--“sakhi mālati,
GK19bahcar1u:510: sā na kācidyā na bhavasi me svasā sakhī praṇayinī prāṇasamā ca /
GK19bahcar1u:511: niyujyatāṃ yāvataḥ kāryasya kṣamaṃ kṣodīyasī garīyasī vā śarīrakamidam /
GK19bahcar1u:523: na ca bāliśatā capalatā cāraṇatā vā vācālatāyāḥ kāraṇam /
GK19bahcar1u:526: yadaiva dṛṣṭāsi devena tata evārabyāsya kāmo guruḥ,
GK19bahcar1u:553: tadevamagocare girāmasīti śrutvā devī pramāṇam' ityabhidhāya tūṣṇīmabhūta /
GK19bahcar1u:560: atiprasādāya' iti vyāhṛtya praharṣaparavaśā praṇamya prajavinā turageṇa tatāra śoṇam /
GK19bahcar1u:563: utkaṇṭhābhārabhṛtā ca tāmyatā cetasā kalpāyitaṃ kathaṅkathamapi divasaśeṣamanaiṣīt /
GK19bahcar1u:566_0: prahasitāmiva sitāṃ diśaṃ paurandarīṃ darīmiva kesariṇi muñcati candramasi sarasvatī
GK19bahcar1u:566_1: śucini cīnāṃśukasukumāratare taraṅgiṇi dugūlakomalaśayana iva śoṇasaikate samupaviṣṭā
GK19bahcar1u:568: ayamasāvāhṛto hṛdayadayito janaḥ' iti śravaṇasamīpavartinā nivedyamānamadanasaṃdeśevendunā,
GK19bahcar1u:569: vikīryamāṇanakhakiraṇacakravālena vālavyajanīkṛtacandrakalākalāpeneva kareṇa vījayantī svedinaṃ kapolapaṭṭam,
GK19bahcar1u:570_0: “atra dadhīcādṛte na kenacitpraveṣṭavyam' iti tiraśvīnaṃ cittabhuvā pātitāṃ vilāsavetralatāmiva
GK19bahcar1u:570_1: bālamṛṇālikāmadhistanaṃ stanayantī kathamapi hṛdayena vahanti pratipālayāmāsa āsīccāsyā
GK19bahcar1u:570_2: manasi--“ahamapi nāma sarasvatī yatrāmunā manaujanmanā jānatyeva paravaśīkṛtā /
GK19bahcar1u:571: tatra kā gaṇanetarāsu tapasvinīṣvatitaralāsu taruṇīṣu' iti /
GK19bahcar1u:580: antaḥsphuratā mattamadanakarikarṇaśahkhāyamānena pratimendunā prathamasamāgamavilāsavilakṣasmiteneva dhavalīkriyamāṇaikakapolodaro mālatīdvitīyo dadhīcaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:581: āgatya ca hṛdayagatadayitānūpuraravavimiśrayeva haṃsagadgadayā girā kṛtasaṃbhāṣaṇo yathā manmathaḥ samājñāpayati,
GK19bahcar1u:590: tasmai ca jātamātrāyaiva “samyaksarahasyāḥ sarvevedāḥ sarvāṇi ca śāstrāṇi sakalāśca kalā matprabhāvātṝ svayamāvirbhaviṣyanti' iti varamadātṝ /
GK19bahcar1u:591: sadbhartṛślāghayā darśayitumiva hṛdayenādāya dadhīcaṃ pitāmahādeśātsamaṃ sāvitryā punarapi brahnalokamāruroha /
GK19bahcar1u:592_0: gatāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ dadhīco 'pi hṛdaye hrādinyevābhihato bhārgavavaṃśasaṃbhūtasya bhrāturbrāhnaṇasya
GK19bahcar1u:592_1: jāyāmakṣamālābhidhānāṃ munikanyakāmātmasūnoḥ saṃvardhanāya niyujya virahāturastapase vanamasāt /
GK19bahcar1u:593: yasminnevāvasare sarasvatyasūta tanayaṃ tasminnevākṣamālāpi sutaṃ prasūtavatī /
GK19bahcar1u:594: tau tu sā nirviśeṣaṃ sāmānyastanyādinā śanaiḥ śanaiḥ śiśū samavardhayat /
GK19bahcar1u:598: atha sārasvato māturmahimnā yauvanārambha evāvirbhūtāśeṣavidyāsaṃbhārastasminsavayasi bhrātari preyasi prāṇasame suhṛdi vatse vāṅmayaṃ samastameva saṃcārayāmāsa /
GK19bahcar1u:599: cakāra ca kṛtadāraparigrahasyāsya tasmiṃnneva pradeśe prītyā prītikūṭanāmānaṃ nivāsam /
GK19bahcar1u:605: jaṭī ca bhūtvā tapasyato janayitureva jagāmāntikam /
GK19bahcar1u:613: askhalitapravṛtto bhāgīrathīpravāha iva pāvanaḥ prāvartata vimalo vaṃśaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:657: atikrāmati ca kāle prasavaparamparābhiranavaratamāpatati vikāśini vātsyāyanakule,
GK19bahcar1u:658: krameṇa kuberanāmā vainateya iva gurupakṣapāti dvijo janma lebhe /
GK19bahcar1u:659: tasyābhavannacyutar iśāno haraḥ pāśupataśceti catvāro yugārambhā iva brāhnatejojanyamānaprajāvistārā nārāyaṇabāhudaṇjā iva saccakranandakāstanayāḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:660: tatra pāśupatasyaika evābhavad bhūbhāra ivācalakulasthitiḥ sthiraścaturudadhigambhīror'thapatiriti nāmnā samagrāgrajanmacakracūḍāmaṇirmahātmā sūnuḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:661_0: so 'janayad bhṛguṃ haṃsaṃ śuciṃ kaviṃ mahīdataṃ dharmaṃ jātavedasaṃ citrabhānuṃ tryakṣaṃ
GK19bahcar1u:662: alabhata ca citrabhānusteṣāṃ madhye rājadevyabhidhānāyāṃ brāhnaṇyāṃ bāṇamātmajam /
GK19bahcar1u:663: sa bāla eva balavato vidhervaśādupasaṃpannayā vyayujyata jananyā /
GK19bahcar1u:666: kṛtopanayanādikriyākalāpasya samāvṛttasya cāsya caturdaśavarṣadeśīyasya pitāpi śrutismṛtivihitaṃ kṛtvā dvijajanocitaṃ nikhilaṃ puṇyajātaṃ kālenādaśamīstha evāstamagamat /
GK19bahcar1u:667: saṃsthite ca pitari mahatā śokenābhīlamanuprāpto divāniśaṃ dahnamānahṛdayaḥ kathaṅkathamapi katipayāndivasānātmagṛha evānaiṣīt /
GK19bahcar1u:668: gate ca viralatāṃ śoke śanaiḥ śanairavinayanidānatayā svātantrayasya,
GK19bahcar1u:707_1: satsvapipitṛpitāmahopātteṣu brāhnaṇajanociteṣu vibhaveṣu sati cāvicchinne vidyāprasaṅge gṛhānniragāt /
GK19bahcar1u:708: agācca niravagraho grahavāniva navayauvanena svairiṇā manasā mahatāmupahāsyatām /
GK19bahcar1u:715: mahataśca kālāttameva bhūyo vātsyāyanavaṃśāśramamātmano janmabhuvaṃ brāhnaṇādhivāsamagamatṝ /
GK19bahcar1u:716: tatra ca ciradarśanādabhinavībhūtasnehasadbhāvaiḥ sasaṃstavaprakaṭitajñāteyairāptairutsavadivasa ivānanditāgamano bālamitramaṇḍalamadhyagato mokṣasukhamivānvabhavatṝ /
GK19bahcar1u:717: iti śrīmahākavibāṇamaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite vātsyāyanavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma prathama ucchvāsaḥ
